vocabulary.definition: a person who designs buildings and in many cases also supervises their construction
vocabulary.example: The architect presented the blueprints for the new office building.

vocabulary.definition: having three sides and three angles
vocabulary.example: The park had a triangular-shaped fountain at its center.

vocabulary.definition: following traditional forms and genres, as in music, art, or literature
vocabulary.example: She preferred to dress conventionally for the formal event.

vocabulary.definition: to rid of whatever is impure or undesirable; cleanse; purify
vocabulary.example: The company decided to purge all outdated files from its database.

vocabulary.definition: having great influence on someone or something
vocabulary.example: His grandmother was an influential figure in his life.
The instructions were unclear, so I had to ask for clarification.
